plays.text: Goal scored by Chris Neil assisted by Martin Havlat and Chris Herperger
Penalty to Karel Rachunek 2 minutes for Crosschecking Sergei Berezin

Penalty to Gino Odjick 2 minutes for Charging Wade Redden
Goal scored by Radek Bonk assisted by Marian Hossa and Martin Havlat
Goal scored by Oleg Petrov assisted by Richard Zednik and Craig Rivet
Penalty to Andreas Dackell 2 minutes for High Sticking Todd White

Penalty to Todd White 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Craig Rivet
Goal scored by Oleg Petrov assisted by Stephane Quintal
Goal scored by Richard Zednik assisted by Oleg Petrov and Stephane Quintal
Penalty to Gino Odjick 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Daniel Alfredsson assisted by Sami Salo and Chris Phillips
Penalty to Stephane Quintal 2 minutes for Kneeing Martin Havlat
Penalty to Magnus Arvedson 2 minutes for Slashing Oleg Petrov
Goal scored by Magnus Arvedson assisted by Wade Redden
Penalty to Zdeno Chara 2 minutes for Crosschecking Chad Kilger
